headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: rule_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the rules that you want to update status.

parameters.name: operate_type
parameters.description: Operation type. Enum values: TURN_ON , TURN_OFF , DELETE .

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language of the response error message if there is an error occurred. Enum values: ZH (Simplified Chinese), EN (English)(default), JA (Japanese).

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: rule_ids
fields.description: IDs of the rules whose status have been successfully updated.
